subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jon Lester pitched three-hit ball into the eighth inning, Jonny Gomes’s three-run homer capped a four-run first, and the Boston Red Sox beat host Los Angeles, 4-0.
snippet: Jon Lester pitched three-hit ball into the eighth inning, Jonny Gomes’s three-run homer capped a four-run first, and the Boston Red Sox beat host Los Angeles, 4-0.
